description: 66 years old. He`s an advisor for the Tesla Leich laboratory. He`s a master of Jigen-Ryuu, and teaches both Zengar and Bullet. He also assisted in the development of the Grungust series` swords, and in producing the motion data for them. Though he`s very strict concerning matters of the sword, he`s usually a good-natured man. He assists Zengar and Elzam in the stealing of the Daizengar and Aussenseiter. His skills with a sword are so great, that he`s able to cut bullets into two.
name: Rishu Tougou
